content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-10.5, -49.5), (-11.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5)

### Iron Plate Storage and Distribution at Position (-12.5, -44.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chests at positions (-10.5, -45.5), (-11.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserters Waiting for Items
- Ensure that the upstream supply is consistent and sufficient to keep the inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), and (-8.5, -44.5) supplied with items to prevent them from idling.

### Full Chests at Drop Positions
- Regularly check and empty the chests at drop positions such as (41.5, -80.5) and (-14.5, -48.5) to prevent mining drills from halting due to full inventories.

### Furnaces with No Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have a consistent supply of ingredients to prevent them from idling with the "no ingredients to smelt" warning.
